de.esoco.lib.expression.function

Class TokenStringFormat.PropertyToken

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.esoco.lib.expression.function.TokenStringFormat.Token<java.lang.Object>
      • de.esoco.lib.expression.function.TokenStringFormat.PropertyToken
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    Enclosing class:
    TokenStringFormat<T>

    public static class TokenStringFormat.PropertyToken
extends TokenStringFormat.Token<java.lang.Object>
    Token subclass that can retrieve properties from the input objects.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PropertyToken(java.lang.String sPropertyMethod)
      Constructor for a token that will retrieve a certain property from the input value by invoking a no-argument public access method on it through reflection.
      PropertyToken(java.lang.String sPropertyMethod, java.lang.String sFormat, java.lang.Object... rArgs)
      Constructor for a token that will retrieve a certain property from the input value by invoking a no-argument public access method on it through reflection.
      PropertyToken(TokenStringFormat<?> rParent, java.lang.String sPropertyMethod, java.lang.String sFormat, java.lang.Object... rArgs)
      Constructor for a token that will retrieve a certain property from the input value by invoking a no-argument public access method on it through reflection.

      java.lang.Object extractValue(java.lang.Object rInput)
      Formats a value of the input value according to this format elements definition.

      • Methods inherited from class de.esoco.lib.expression.function.TokenStringFormat.Token

    • Constructor Detail

      • PropertyToken

        public PropertyToken(java.lang.String sPropertyMethod)
        Constructor for a token that will retrieve a certain property from the input value by invoking a no-argument public access method on it through reflection. The property method argument must contain the full name of the method (e.g. 'getValue'). It will also be used as the token string of this token.
        Parameters:
        sPropertyMethod - The name of the property access method (must be public)

      • PropertyToken

        public PropertyToken(java.lang.String sPropertyMethod,
                     java.lang.String sFormat,
                     java.lang.Object... rArgs)
        Constructor for a token that will retrieve a certain property from the input value by invoking a no-argument public access method on it through reflection. The property method argument must contain the full name of the method (e.g. 'getValue'). It will also be used as the token string of this token.
        Parameters:
        sPropertyMethod - The name of the property access method (must be public)
        sFormat - The format of the property (NULL for default)
        rArgs - The optional arguments of the method call

      • PropertyToken

        public PropertyToken(TokenStringFormat<?> rParent,
                     java.lang.String sPropertyMethod,
                     java.lang.String sFormat,
                     java.lang.Object... rArgs)
        Constructor for a token that will retrieve a certain property from the input value by invoking a no-argument public access method on it through reflection. The property method argument must contain the full name of the method (e.g. 'getValue'). It will also be used as the token string of this token.
        Parameters:
        rParent - The parent format of this token
        sPropertyMethod - The name of the property access method (must be public)
        sFormat - The format of the property (NULL for default)
        rArgs - The optional arguments of the method call

    • Method Detail

      • extractValue

        public java.lang.Object extractValue(java.lang.Object rInput)
        Formats a value of the input value according to this format elements definition. The default implementation invokes a method on the input value object with the name that has been defined in the constructor. Subclasses may return NULL to signal that the result shall be ignored.
        Specified by:
        extractValue in class TokenStringFormat.Token<java.lang.Object>
        Parameters:
        rInput - The input value to format
        Returns:
        The formatted result
